needpage: Need web page or your own application?
needtext: Reach me out. I will help you to design yopur web page, application or even whole system! Individual pricing depending on the scope of work. Contact me.
whatido: I create my websites based on the Angular framework. Thanks to this, they are 'light', fast, responsive and always up to date. The final product of the Angular framework is a static website that can be run on any hosting based on Windows, Linux, Docker or the cloud.
experience: I create web and desktop applications, websites and APIs. I will help you prepare the runtime environment and the necessary configuration. I have experience in working with the AWS cloud confirmed by a certificate.
inprogress: Page under construction. If you need your own web page / application please contact me!
